name: /Root_
description:
In "/Root_", you will play as a virus deployed by a hacker, tasked to navigate through a complex server system and reach the "/root" directory.

The server is guarded by firewalls, you'll need to avoid falling into the void areas of the system and avoid getting scanned by the firewall. 

All you need to do is orient the constant rolling virus through the maze-like network. Can you outwit the firewall and void zone, and reach the core of the server? 

Pick up the challenges and proof your hacking skill on the leaderboard!
